Write entomology

Source: R/xml_entomology_define.R
make_ento_compat.Rd

Write entomology

Usage

make_ento_compat(
  baseList,
  mosqs,
  contrib = c(0.81, 0.08, 0.09, 0.02),
  propInfected = 0.078,
  propInfectious = 0.021,
  EIR = "@EIR@",
  seasonality = paste0("@m", 1:12, "@")
)

Arguments

baseList

List with experiment data.

mosqs

Mosquito vectors

contrib

Proportion contribution

propInfected

Proportion infected

propInfectious

Proportion infectious

EIR

EIR value

seasonality

Vector of length 12
